title: gcalcli config
description:
User configuration for gcalcli command-line tool.

See https://pypi.org/project/gcalcli/.

CalendarsSection.title: Settings about the set of calendars gcalcli operates on

default-calendars.title: Calendars to use as default for certain commands when no explicit target calendar is otherwise specified

ignore-calendars.title: Calendars to ignore by default (unless explicitly included using --calendar) when running commands against all calendars

OutputSection.title: Settings about gcalcli output (formatting, colors, etc)

week-start.title: Weekday to treat as start of week
